title: A song of Sion written by a citizen thereof, whose outward habitation is in Virginia, and being sent over to some of his friends in England, the same is found fitting to be published, for to warn the seed of evil doers ... ; with an additional post-script by another hand.
author: Grave, John.
notes: Attributed to John Grave by Wing.
Poem dated: Virginia, The begining of the third month, 1662. p.10.
"Post Script" signed and dated: M.M. 25th 6 month 1662 [p. 12] [M.M. is Mary Mollineux or Martin Mason].
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
